title: Get a Homemade Trailer Plate
text_content:
Instructions
To get a plate for your homemade trailer, please follow the steps below.
Submit a completed, signed
VSA 22
application and a $5 plate fee, at your local DMV
or
by mail.
Department of Motor Vehicles
Vehicle Branding Work Center
P.O. Box 27412
Richmond, Virginia 23269-0001
When you have the VIN plate
Follow the directions on the back of
VSA 22
.
Contact your local law enforcement officer to
Inspect the mounted plate
Sign the VSA 22 application
If you reside in Virginia Beach or Chesapeake, contact DMV Vehicle Branding at 804-367-1179 to request an agent to inspect the trailer. There is no fee for this service.
Submit the following to your local DMV office to obtain a title and trailer tag:
VSA 22
VSA 17A
$5 plate fee
$75 minimum sales and use tax
$10 plate fee
